UPDATE: The Billings #MonTwitterMeetup has been moved to Canyon Creek Brewery. Same time at 4 p.m. this Friday, Aug. 27th.

The new location has a larger patio that will serve a large group better so we can be outdoors and minimize our time indoors.

Hope to see you there!
